function git-locomote { param($platform_id) python -m tools.scripts.git_manager locomote $platform_id }
function git-exercise { param($platform_id) python -m tools.scripts.git_manager exercise $platform_id }
function git-logic { param($subcommand) python -m tools.scripts.git_manager logic $subcommand }
function git-tcreate { param($name) python -m tools.scripts.git_manager topic create $name }
function git-tlist { python -m tools.scripts.git_manager topic list }
function git-analyze { python -m tools.scripts.git_manager intelligence analyze @args }
function git-suggest { python -m tools.scripts.git_manager intelligence suggest }
function git-organize-intel { python -m tools.scripts.git_manager intelligence organize }
